About

I’m Diego, an electronics & automation maker. I prototype interactive systems by combining ESP32, Jetson Nano and 3D design/printing. I enjoy turning ideas into working hardware.

Tools I use: SolidWorks, Arduino/ESP-IDF, Python, OpenCV, stepper drivers, relays and sensors (Hall, TCS3200, etc.). I care about clean wiring, reliable firmware and clear documentation.
